headline: LVMH: Decline Reflects Two Concerns
summary: LVMH faces Q1 sales decline due to luxury market trends in China/US and lost market share. The stock's decline has been overpronounced. See more here.

headline: Deutsche Bank Goes Bullish on Luxury Brand Ralph Lauren's Stock
summary: Ralph Lauren is a luxury brand with an appealing stock, according to Deutsche Bank analysts.

headline: Gap CEO: The trade war has not stalled our turnaround
summary: Gap CEO Richard Dickson says his business is doing just fine, despite the headwinds borne from the Trump trade war.

raw.headline: Gap CEO: The trade war has not stalled our turnaround

headline: Airbnb downgrade, Ralph Lauren rated a Buy: Trending Tickers
summary: Airbnb (ABNB) stock was downgraded to a Sell rating by Truist analysts, reducing their price target to $106 per share on softening demand forecasts for summer leisure travel. Deutsche Bank resume its coverage on Ralph Lauren (RL) with a Buy rating and price target of $343. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.
